body: So now the pope is going to further corrupt poor Iraq. For those who don't know, pope francis is the false prophet of the Book of Revelation.
body_html: So now the pope is going to further corrupt poor Iraq. For those who don't know, pope francis is the false prophet of the Book of Revelation.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: Look, these "prophecies" have run rampant since day 1, and all kinds of crazy shit has happened in the past few years alone. And none of it ever comes true. What makes you think this is any different? Just accept that we don't know.

body:
Oops, be careful about saying what He is and isn't concerned about for we are not above Him. If He has revealed it to his servants then the Lord God clearly wants us to be informed. Too many sources to list here or even keep a bibliography for. I suggest you do your own research. This is not an academic debate. Here is one source that personally transformed my life, however, you need to have focus and concentration, and to be able to switch off the trained academic mind to fully absorb without judgment. If you can't deny your flesh (mind), your spirit will not be able to receive this or be ministered to.
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=7v554QtlGKs
